title: About Me
content: Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience delivering measurable business impact through technology. Currently AWS Certified in Cloud and AI, with a proven track record of reducing critical incidents by 25% and accelerating deployment times by 30%. I combine deep technical expertise with business acumen (Master's in Economics) to build solutions that drive both performance and profitability.

At Freelancer Outsourcing UK Limited, I lead platform stability initiatives and cross-functional teams, working with AWS services, Docker, Jenkins, and modern full-stack technologies. My experience spans from implementing secure authentication solutions with OAuth2 and Keycloak to developing high-performance RESTful APIs that serve millions of users. I've successfully mentored teams across international markets including Germany, Slovenia, and the UK.

What sets me apart is my ability to translate complex technical challenges into clear business outcomes. Whether it's optimizing AWS infrastructure for cost efficiency, implementing automated testing that reduces deployment risks, or designing scalable architectures that grow with business needs, I focus on delivering solutions that make both technical and financial sense. My Economics background helps me understand the broader business context and ensure every technical decision supports organizational goals.
